Summary: star like object different directions different times
divs: Sighting Detailsi stay up late at night in my backyard and i sit outside to smoke and i always look at the stars. for the past six years Ive seen plenty of planes from the Tulsa area and i see a lot of commercial flights but every so often i see a light that looks like a star traveling in different directions and at different speeds and different times always at night very high up i would guess 30,000 feet or better no flashing lights solid light i always look for anything moving in the night sky different movement they just seem to appear and i watch them until they disappear not sure what it is i know we have satalites but these must be huge to see from the ground that high up just not sure what they are. my wife and i both have seen them
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in McAlester
There were no other sightings in McAlester on or around June 23rd 2008
